raw_comment: I see that in poorer countries the idea that the world is getting better each generation is shared between adults and children,but in wealthier countries like the U.S the people are more split on the subject this could be due to naive tendencies of young people or the stubborn ideas of the old.
ace_sentences: In poorer countries, adults share an idea.
In poorer countries, children share this idea.
The idea is that the world is getting better in each generation.
The U.S. is a wealthier country.
In wealthier countries, people are more split about this idea.
This split could be due to naive tendencies of young people.
This split could be due to stubborn ideas of old people.
